DOC.brief_summary: Pain after dry needling or injection in the muscle is a frequent secondary effect in the treatment of myofascial pain syndrome. In this trial spray and stretch technique is evaluated as a method to reduce this soreness. As well, the characteristics and the different factors that influence in this pain will be described.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Spray and Stretch on Postneedling Soreness and Sensitivity After Dry Needling of a Latent Myofascial Trigger Point.
DOC.criteria: Subjects presenting latent trigger points in the trapezius muscle Subjects with active trigger points or absence of trigger points.
